settings.heading: What is Permanent Makeup?
settings.row_content: Permanent makeup is the self-beautifying, confidence boosting time-saver that we all have been looking for. Using a variety of safe and sustainable techniques, the pigmentation under the superficial layer of skin is toned to highlight your latent and natural beauty. At Ariyah Allure, we focus on the pre-care and post-care so you know what to expect, how to treat yourself and when to come back to see me again!

settings.heading: Does it hurt?
settings.row_content: Permanent Makeup application should never hurt when the correct methodology is used and procedures performed. While it is reasonable to expect some minor discomfort as we apply the beauty reveal technique, at Ariyah Allure, we mitigate pain by using a variety of medical-grade numbing creams, designed with your sensitity in mind, and are only used for these procedures.

settings.heading: What is Your Process?
settings.row_content: At Ariyah Allure, our process centers on YOU! We put you at the forefront starting with a chat or coffee and dish through the Discovery Process - what inner beauty are you looking to reveal today? The next logical step is to design YOUR desired look, with a test case and palette selection. Your style comes through with certainty and we go from there. Your passion is our purpose!

settings.heading: What do I do if I don't like it?
settings.row_content: This is rare & infrequent! At Ariyah Allure, PMA Kylee takes pride in never having had a disappointed client! The utmost precaution and preparation are taken in advance to understand precisely how you want the reveal to proceed. Your satisfaction, however, is guaranteed - and we ensure your delight. If at any point in the process you are not feeling 100% your best self we will ensure to reschedule an update to your new look at no further cost to you.

settings.heading: Can I come back if I love it?
settings.row_content: Permanent Makeup is a life-changer, time-saver, confidence booster and a BIG reveal of the beauty within all along - you will ABSOLUTELY be scheduled for your return visit! Contact us back at any time and follow us on IG & FB!

settings.text:
No two skin types and tones are the same!  Everyone’s reaction will be ever so slightly different. 
Contact me for a consultation so I can address any question and alleviate any single concern! 

That said, most of Pre-Care comes down to awareness; what is the procedure, how am I
affected and when do I get to start enjoying my amazing self-investment?

First, please understand that for the first 2-3 days following any application of permanent makeup, you will have swelling, redness and tenderness in the area of your newly applied makeup. 

Any treated area should take around 7 days to fully heal, although for some individuals it varies.  Upon leaving, the color may look too dark and in 3 to 5 days it may look too light! 
Right around 7 to 10 days, however, the treatment color comes in perfectly as planned!  At your follow up or touch up visit, which we will schedule, any irregularities are corrected and filled.

I work with you up front to establish a clear understanding of what you’ll experience and how to get the absolute best from working with me! 

That said, if you’re unsatisfied we will work together to get you to a
place where you LOVE the new you, that is my commitment to you and our community.
